Knowing is not enough, we must apply it. Willing is not enough, we must do. Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Who We Are

"Here we are not only focused on making tech products. But it also makes technology accessible, affordable and easy for everyone to learn.


Yussan Media Group (previously known as Id More) starts from a team of students who often participate in various tech product competitions, Hackathon and the like. Until finally we decided to create an Indonesian online competition platform, as well as the First Yussan Media Group product, until later other products and programs were created.
